thread.title: Rooney To Remain At Manchester United
thread.title_full: Rooney To Remain At Manchester United

author: Akinola Ajibola
title: Rooney To Remain At Manchester United
text:
Rooney To Remain At Manchester United   
Wayne Rooney has confirmed he will be staying with Manchester United for the foreseeable future. 
After being linked with a move to China , the England captain said he hoped to “play a full part” in the rest of the Premier League club’s season. 
“It’s an exciting time at the club and I want to remain a part,” said the 31-year-old. 
Rooney, who recently became the Red Devils’ record goal scorer, said he would remain at the club he joined from Everton back in 2004. More on Sports
